channel.title: Some MORE server Help
channel.description:
Okay, so im new and i need help =p call me a retard if you will lol...but this is what i need help with
-When i pickpocket npc's....it Disconnects the character...why? and how do i fix it? -I want to make the Ape Atoll tele spell work, as well as the last 6 ancient teleports....how do i make them??? (i've messed with them for about 2 days, no luck) -I'm trying to add the ability for regular players to use ::char (yes, its char not ::redesign, i've already searched the client)...so...how would i go about doing that...if you need my codings, let me knwo and i'll post them for this -Npc's stretch when they fight/die...is that fixable? -Changing the speed of the weapons....how would you go about doing that????
--I don't know if anyone can help me with these problems on here, but it'd be greatly appreciated, as im a beginner coder using java...i mostly did html, c++ and php...so ...if anyone can help me, i'd <3 you forever, lol....send me messages though, as well as posts if u could...i seen that this site goes rather fast--
THANKS
~Kx

item.title: Some MORE server Help
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

the NPC death and attacking is not necessarily client sided, you have to make it call for the correct emote for them

(btw, dying for a human character is 0x900)

Read full topic

item.title: Some MORE server Help
item.dc:creator: @KxWarrior KxWarrior
item.description:
@KxWarrior wrote:

Still aint got a clue on what your talking about :o…but i foudn the coding for theiving…so…could you explain why it dc’s me?

public void robwarrior() { sendMessage("You pickpocket the warrior."); addItem(995, 18); addSkillXP(26, 17); int npcIndex = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); int EnemyX2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].absX; int EnemyY2 = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].absY; TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX2, EnemyY2); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 08, 2008, 03:29:37 PM[/size][hr]and i can’t find that action button crap [br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 08, 2008, 03:40:58 PM[/size][hr]=[ needs helpeth

Read full topic

Alright thanks muchly you’re definately gettin reps for helping me…now a few more things…

with teleports…u said something about packet185…could you indulge me in information on what that is…and etc.

item.title: Some MORE server Help
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("tele") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,10)); int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(11,16)); teleportToX = newPosX; teleportToY = newPosY; } catch(Exception e) }

[quote author=KxWarrior link=topic=240720.msg2039821#msg2039821 date=1202522501]
Ok i found another one i needed…

–i cant use normal tele…

else if (command.startsWith("bank")) { openUpBank(); }

else if(command.startsWith("char")){ showInterface(3559);

Read full topic

item.title: Some MORE server Help
item.dc:creator: @KxWarrior KxWarrior
item.description:
@KxWarrior wrote:

Ok i found another one i needed…

–i cant use normal tele…

//else if (command.startsWith("bank") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) //if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970) // { // sendMessage("You cannot bank above Y 3712 wildy."); //} //else //{ // openUpBank(); //}

Telport Code

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“tele”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
if(absY >= 3712 && absY <= 3970)
{
sendMessage(“You can not teleport above level 20 wilderness.”);
}
else if (absY <= 3712)
try
{
int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,10));
int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(11,16));
teleportToX = newPosX;
teleportToY = newPosY;
}
catch(Exception e)
{
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::tele #####,#####”);
}

 else if (absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970)
try
    {
		int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5,10));
		int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(11,16));
		teleportToX = newPosX;
		teleportToY = newPosY;
}
	catch(Exception e) 
    { 
    sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::tele 3400,3500"); 
    }

 else if (absY >= 10112)
 {
 sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.");
 }
 }[/code]

and the ::char code…here finally haha

else if(command.startsWith("char") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) { showInterface(3559);

Okay…how would i remove the anti-leech thing then…because there is no invalid id for coins…
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 08, 2008, 03:02:07 PM[/size][hr]i think i just relaized why bank isnt working…it’s in comments…jesus…![br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 08, 2008, 03:02:41 PM[/size][hr]also, how do i make a packet 185 for the action???

Read full topic

item.title: Some MORE server Help
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

  1. Invalid items or anti-leech
  2. Packet 185 make a case for the action button
  3. post you ::char command.
  4. No it’s client side.
  5. I just Helped you

-When i pickpocket npc’s…it Disconnects the character…why? and how do i fix it?
